        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1174</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Lihitraot Lot! Avraham and Lot Separate 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lihitraot Lot! Avraham und Lot trennen 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sort de Lihitraot ! Avraham et sort 
séparent 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lote De Lihitraot! Avraham e o lote separam
2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lotto Di Lihitraot! Avraham ed il lotto 
separano 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέρος Lihitraot! Το Avraham και το μέρος 
χωρίζουν 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Porción De Lihitraot! Avraham y la 
porción separan 2</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">learners act out the events of the text and learn about compromise.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">avram, lot, bible, bereshit</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anfänger fungieren aus den Fällen des Textes 
und erlernen über Kompromiß.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les étudiants agissent hors des événements du 
texte et se renseignent sur le compromis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os learners agem para fora dos eventos do texto e
aprendem sobre o acordo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">i principianti si comportano verso l'esterno gli 
eventi del testo ed imparano circa il compromesso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οι αρχάριοι ενεργούν έξω τα γεγονότα του κειμένου και
μαθαίνουν για το συμβιβασμό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los principiantes actúan fuera de los 
acontecimientos del texto y aprenden sobre compromiso.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">avram, Lot, Bibel, bereshit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">avram, sort, bible, bereshit</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">avram, porción, biblia, bereshit</string>
          </keyword>
